data.sentence: The word وَمَا comes from the root م ا and is associated with the meanings:
The word نَحْنُ comes from the root ن ح ن and is associated with the meanings: We

data.meanings: chastisement, castigate, punishment, torture, torment, retribution, abstain/desist, relinquish, quit.adhb - sweet (usually water), e.g. 25:53, 35:12.
data.sentence: The word بِمُعَذَّبِينَ comes from the root ع ذ ب and is associated with the meanings: chastisement, castigate, punishment, torture, torment, retribution, abstain/desist, relinquish, quit.adhb - sweet (usually water), e.g. 25:53, 35:12.
